Title: Use XML Literals in Visual Basic .NET to generate TwiML
Description: Learn how to generate TwiML instructions to respond to texts and voice calls using XML Literals in Visual Basic .NET and ASP.NET Core Minimal APIs.

Title: Announcing the Webhook Plugin: Validate your webhooks with the new webhook plugin for the Twilio CLI
Description: Emulate webhook requests to test your Twilio webhook applications using the new webhook plugin for the Twilio CLI.
